title: Falkenberg
text:
Instructions

1 BH Topspin in BH (diagonal) B: Block in BH

2 FH Topspin from BH in BH (diagonal) B: Block in FH

3 FH Topspin from FH in BH (parallel) B: Block in BH

... and repeat!

title: Passive Play: Block from Middle - Outside, alternating
text:
Instructions

1 FH Block to FH

B: Topspin to BH or FH

2 FH or BH Block to FH

B: Topspin to Middle

... and repeat!

title: Falkenberg (Small)
text:
Instructions

1 BH Topspin to BH (diagonal)

B: Block to BH

2 FH Topspin from BH to BH (diagonal)

B: Block to Middle

3 FH Topspin from Middle to BH

B: Block to BH

... and repeat!

title: Short Serve | FH Opening from Middle | FH Topspin
text:
Instructions

1 Short serve, free placement

B: Push to Middle long

2 VH Topspin to RH

B:Block to VH (wide)

3 FH Topspin free placement

... and finish the rally!

title: BH | Middle | FH
text:
Instructions

1 BH Topspin to BH (diagonal)

B: Block to Middle

2 FH Topspin from Middle to BH

B: Block to FH

3 FH Topspin to BH (parallel)

B: Block to BH

... and repeat!

title: Middle - Outside alternating
text:
Instructions

1 FH topspin from middle to BH

B: Block to FH or BH

2 FH or BH topspin to BH

B: Block to middle

... and repeat!

title: Serve long | Take over the attack
text:
Instructions

1 Serve to BH (long)

B: Topspin to BH

2 Block with kick/ spin or BH topspin to BH

B: Free play

... and finish the rally!

title: FH topspin left-right
text:
Instructions

1 FH topspin to FH (diagonal)

B: Block to FH

2 FH topspin to BH (parallel)

B: Block to FH

... and repeat!
